name: Boneshard Wraith
description: The Boneshard Wraith is a disembodied undead entity that strikes fear with its unsettling presence, featuring sharp bone fragments that hover around it and the ability to phase through solid matter.
memorable: Its most terrifying aspect is the ability to rise as a Boneshard Wraith again if a creature dies while trapped in its powerful Boneshard Cyclone ability.
goals: Lurking in shadows, it seeks to instill fear and incapacitate living creatures.
relations: Often encountered with other undead creatures, it may serve as a harbinger of greater evils.
environment: Commonly found in dark, haunted places or ruins.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage and various conditions, coupled with high mobility and stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, which imposes disadvantages on its attack rolls and perception checks.
attacks: Utilizes long-range spectral claw attacks that can inflict exhaustion on its targets, and has the deadly Boneshard Cyclone ability.
most_powerful_ability: Boneshard Cyclone, which can deal heavy damage and potentially cause a victim to rise as a Boneshard Wraith after death.
senses: Possesses a passive perception score of 16, allowing it to detect hidden creatures or objects effectively.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, making it an effective ambush predator.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement allows it to traverse through both creatures and objects.
It has advantage on stealth checks due to its wraith nature.
Capable of paralyzing targets upon successful dual attacks with its spectral claws.
Has significant resistances to elemental damage.
Immune to being frightened, paralyzed, and several other debilitating conditions.
test_queries: creature that can turn victims into wraiths
